meanings.definition: A device or software that converts analog information into digital form.
meanings.sent1: The digitizers in my tablet help me draw on the screen.
meanings.sent2: The company purchased new digitizers to improve their document scanning process.
meanings.sent3: The digitizers at the art store were feeling pixelated today.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like digitizers, translating the world into a digital canvas.
meanings.sent5: The digitizers hummed softly as they transformed the music into digital notes.

meanings.definition: A person or company that specializes in digitizing information.
meanings.sent1: The digitizers at the office were experts in converting old records into digital files.
meanings.sent2: I hired a team of digitizers to help me digitize my photo collection.
meanings.sent3: The digitizers at the tech fair were busy scanning everything in sight.
meanings.sent4: She was a human digitizer, turning memories into digital data effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The skilled digitizers worked tirelessly to preserve historical documents in digital form.

meanings.definition: The act of converting information into a digital format.
meanings.sent1: Digitizers have made it easier to store and access data online.
meanings.sent2: The digitizers of the old photos brought them back to life in digital albums.
meanings.sent3: The magician's wand seemed to perform digitizers on the playing cards.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a digitizer, transforming his mood into a brighter state.
meanings.sent5: The digitizers of the future will revolutionize how we interact with technology.
